def transform_dataset(input_list):
    # Initialize variables
    subjects = []
    students = []
    current_student = []

    for entry in input_list:
        # If there is a name, we encountered a new student
        if entry[0]:
            if current_student:
                students.append(current_student)
            current_student = [entry[0]]
        
        # Add the subject to the subject list if not already added
        if len(subjects) < len(input_list) / (len(students) + 1) and entry[1] not in subjects:
            subjects.append(entry[1])

        # Add the grade to the current student record
        current_student.append(entry[2])
    
    # Don't forget to add the last student record
    if current_student:
        students.append(current_student)

    # Prepare the output list
    output_list = [[''] + subjects] + students

    return output_list

input_data = [['Allen, Peter', 'Art&Des', 'B'], ['', 'CreatArt', 'A'], ['', 'D&T', 'A'], ['', 'English', 'A'], ['', 'Geography', 'A*'], ['', 'History', 'A'], ['', "Hu'ties", 'A'], ['', 'ICT', 'A'], ['', 'Maths', 'A*'], ['', 'MFL', 'A'], ['', 'PE', 'A'], ['', 'Science', 'A*'], ['Allman, Fred', 'Art&Des', 'C'], ['', 'CreatArt', 'B'], ['', 'D&T', 'C'], ['', 'English', 'C'], ['', 'Geography', 'C'], ['', 'History', 'C'], ['', "Hu'ties", 'C'], ['', 'ICT', 'C'], ['', 'Maths', 'C'], ['', 'MFL', 'C'], ['', 'PE', 'B'], ['', 'Science', 'B'], ['Arnold,Mary', 'Art&Des', 'A'], ['', 'CreatArt', 'A'], ['', 'D&T', 'A'], ['', 'English', 'A'], ['', 'Geography', 'A'], ['', 'History', 'A'], ['', "Hu'ties", 'A'], ['', 'ICT', 'B'], ['', 'Maths', 'C'], ['', 'MFL', 'B'], ['', 'PE', 'B'], ['', 'Science', 'B'], ['Johnie,Fedlimid', 'Art&Des', 'A'], ['', 'CreatArt', 'B'], ['', 'D&T', 'A'], ['', 'English', 'A'], ['', 'Geography', 'B'], ['', 'History', 'B'], ['', "Hu'ties", 'B'], ['', 'ICT', 'A'], ['', 'Maths', 'A'], ['', 'MFL', 'A'], ['', 'PE', 'B'], ['', 'Science', 'A']]

def transform_dataset(input_list):
    # Initialize variables
    subjects = []
    students = []
    current_student = []

    for entry in input_list:
        # If there is a name, we encountered a new student
        if entry[0]:
            if current_student:
                students.append(current_student)
            current_student = [entry[0]]
        
        # Add the subject to the subject list if not already added
        if len(subjects) < len(input_list) / (len(students) + 1) and entry[1] not in subjects:
            subjects.append(entry[1])

        # Add the grade to the current student record
        current_student.append(entry[2])
    
    # Don't forget to add the last student record
    if current_student:
        students.append(current_student)

    # Prepare the output list
    output_list = [[''] + subjects] + students

    return output_list

    # Initialize variables
    subjects = []

            subjects.append(entry[1])

        # Add the grade to the current student record
        current_student.append(entry[2])
    
    # Don't forget to add the last student record
    if current_student:

    # Prepare the output list
